values.name: Bagelman
values.description: Bagelman is Brighton’s own authentic bagel bakery chain.  Launched in 1999, it was the first on the South Coast and is the only one in Sussex.  Winner of the Sussex Business Award for best business in Sussex in 2007, Bagelman is a cherished local brand with an enviable reputation for high-quality, healthy made to order fast food.

Update is an affordable one-day conference exploring the hottest topics in mobile design and development. 

Curated by user experience designer and developer Aral Balkan, Update features inspiring talks from top names from the worlds of iOS, web, and user experience including Brendan Dawes, Jeremy Keith, Sarah Parmenter, Matt Gemmell, Jeff LaMarche, and Cennydd Bowles. 

Their inspirational keynote sessions are punctuated by lively geek ninja battles debating platforms and technologies, and the conference day itself is followed by two days of hands-on workshops on topics ranging from iOS design to HTML5 for mobile. 

Update’s special guest this year is Ronald Wayne. He founded Apple alongside Steve Jobs and Steve Wozniak, created the first Apple logo, and wrote the manual for the first Apple computer. He then gave up his 10% share in Apple for just $2,300. If he’d kept it, it would be worth over $30 billion today and would make him one of the world’s 15 richest people.

DATE: 5th September 2011
VENUE: Brighton Dome 
BOOK: http://www.eventbrite.com/event/1423476657
values.name: Update Conference - The human touch: iOS & beyond

values.description:
Since 1991, New England Eye Center has been a leading eye care center in New England.  As the Ophthalmology department of Tufts Medical Center and Tufts University School of Medicine, patients also are seen at our main office in Boston and our satellite locations in Brighton, Brookline, Cambridge, Framingham, Wellesley and Leominster.

New England Eye Center is a complete clinical and technical center for the testing and treatment of all types of eye diseases and visual problems.    We also have a full service LASIK & Premium Cataract Center in Boston.

To complement the expertise of our doctors, our equipment & technology equals or surpasses that found in ophthalmic centers anywhere. Our operating rooms are fully equipped with the latest instrumentation for ophthalmic microsurgery, including advanced vitreoretinal surgery. Our clinical laser center offers a range of therapeutic capabilities equalled by few other ophthalmic centers anywhere in the world.

Patients benefit from the New England Eye Center’s position as a major research and education facility. Our physicians and technical staff are in immediate touch with the latest developments in all areas of ophthalmology. In fact, some of these developments are the result of investigations conducted at the New England Eye Center.
values.name: New England Eye Center

values.description:
Fashion boutique based in Brighton.
At our standalone boutique in the heart of the North Laines, we offer a unique collection of exclusive and stylish Yoma branded shoes, sandals, boots, handbags and accessories.
These are complimented by a beautiful collection of womenswear.
values.name: Yoma Shoes

values.description:
Brighton has a thriving music and media industry, which is constantly growing, and we are pleased to announce a new addition to this up and coming market …. Find A Beat.

Introduction
Find A Beat is a DJ agency supplying professional DJ’s to the best clubs, bars, festivals and large events in the UK and Europe (Find A Beat also supply DJ’s for corporate events and private party’s).  Their roster includes the best new talent together with well-known favourites.

Policy
The music policy is anything that fall’s under the banner of “Dance” from Funky & Soulful House through to Drum & Bass, Breaks or even Chill out.

Roster
Find A Beat’s roster is looking impressive as they are representing well-respected and popular acts such as …
Manumission’s long standing resident Griff
DJ duo Bobkat who are more well know as LnM Projekt under which guise they produced Everywhere which was a top 40 hit on Hed Kandi
Another Ibiza legend and local boy Matt Cassar 
And the ever popular Alex Collings

Background
Russell Ruckman who has been involved in the local dance scene for many years, working on various radio projects and promoting club nights, created Find A Beat.  With his knowledge of the industry and passion for music this is one project that is set for success.

Service
Find A Beat’s aim is to provide the best possible service to every client no matter how big or small the booking and will endeavour to find the right DJ for the event.
values.name: Find A Beat

values.description:
The Bazaar Bar is a small cosy venue, during the day Bazaar is a café bar where you can relax with a coffee and something to eat, read the paper or check your e-mails with the free wireless internet, and at night Bazaar is a pre’ club bar where you can come and enjoy a cocktail in the mellow Moroccan themed lounge bar and hear one of the many resident DJ’s playing a tasteful selection of deep, soulful & funky house.

As well as all this downstairs there is a games room where you can play pool or table football, and soon to come will be another games lounge for those into their consol games.

Bazaar stocks a varied selection of drinks from around the world like, Hoegaarden, Lowenbrau and of course Tuaca which for those of you who don’t know is a brandy based Italian liquor previously only available in its home of Brighton, watch out for this one as Bazaar will be working closely with Tuaca on some promotions in the very near future.

PLEASE NOTE: Bazaar Bar is no longer trading.
values.name: Bazaar Bar

values.description:
City of London Sinfonia creates dynamic and engaging musical experiences for people of all ages and backgrounds. We perform throughout London and the UK in venues ranging from traditional concert halls, to schools and hospitals, alternative venue spaces and diverse community settings. We place our audiences at the heart of everything we do, bringing unforgettable music and cultural events to them.

Led by our Artistic Director, Stephen Layton, and Principal Conductor, Michael Collins, we regularly work with world class artists as well as up and coming talent, including in the last year: Gwilym Simcock, Tim Garland, Polyphony, Hugh Brunt, Roderick Williams and Elizabeth Watts among others. We perform across London at all the major concert halls and venues, as well as St Paul's Cathedral and other venues in the City of London and on the City fringes. We are resident orchestra at the capital's popular Opera Holland Park and regular guests at major UK festivals, performing at the BBC Proms, Brighton, Spitalfields Music and Cheltenham Festivals this year.

Our education and outreach programme, Meet the Music, was one of the first established by a UK orchestra. Last year our musicians spent over 100 days making music with a wide range of groups throughout the country, reaching over 10,000 people.
values.name: City of London Sinfonia

values.description:
Torture Garden is the worlds leading fetish club, with monthly events held in London.  We also hold events in brighton and Edinburgh as well as franchises in Tokyo, Rome, Toronto, Montreal, Paris and Athens.

We also have a production company that produce events, event management and supply performers to companies that like something with a twist.

Clients include Kerrang!, Avalon Productions, Erotica, HMS President, London Tattoo Expo,
values.name: Torture Garden

values.description:
Bright Lite Productions Ltd (BLP) is a fast expanding lighting and sound AV hire firm operating throughout the UK, particularly in London, Brighton, Cardiff, Birmingham, Manchester and Liverpool. BLP has been trading since 2007, the business is on target for considerable growth within the next year covering more aspects of the entertainment industry.


Having a wide range of equipment in stock including:

Generics
Intelligent Lighting
Follow Spots
Lighting Control
LED Fixtures
Truss
Rigging Equipment
Kv2 Audio
Festival PA Equipment
Complete DJ Rigs

From design to delivery and operation of equipment on site, our expertise will ensure that your event runs smoothly as planned.

We can meet any production needs you may have. We can provide a dedicated project manager to work with you from your initial enquiry throughout the planning process to make your event a success.

All technical & design aspects of your event are addressed with our attention to detail you won’t suffer any unfortunate surprises on the day! However, should a shoal of herring fall from the skies you can be certain that our enthusiastic, problem solving team will save the day.

http://blproductions.co.uk
http://portalz.co.uk
values.name: Bright Lite Productions

values.description:
Back in June 2008, I was having a face to face interview for a training position at Virgin Media, I was asked a standard interview question ‘what are your long term career aspirations?’… even back then I knew what I wanted to do.

As a freelance consultant my principles around training solutions are:

“Engage learners early as adults, provide them with an interactive learning environment and give them the tools to retain the information and transfer their new knowledge into the workplace”

Penguin Learning Limited was started back in September 2011 after a company restructure with the goal to design bespoke training solutions to meet a client’s specific needs. My training experience comes from many years attending training courses while working in B2B and B2C sales environment, progressing through to management positions before moving into training and development.

Below is a list of clients past and present:

Wocester Car Sales Ltd
Sandwell Council
Express Estate Agency
Brighton City College
PICS ltd
Carphone Warehouse
Virgin Media
International Hotel Derby
E.On
Sagacity Solutions Ltd
Tomtom
CRM Students Cambridge
Governance Training
Mel Pyke Consultancy
MTD Sales Training
KnowledgePool
Beyond the Box
values.name: Penguin Learning Limited

values.description:
Creative Industrial Design Studio in Brighton. We design and develop new innovative products, from concept through to prototype creation. 

Fondue Design addopts a hands on approach to developing a design, we use low fidelity prototypes every step of the way to help us design products which really work. We like to add as much creative flare into our products to help them stick out from the croud.

Our design process is a clear map which we use to guide us through a project and ensure we achieve our objectives. A project brief clearly identifies our goals and objectives and is used by us as a job sheet and check list. We pride ourselves on project managment and ability to manage your high expectations.
values.name: Fondue Design

values.description:
Foot + Leg Pain Clinics is one of Australia's largest Sports Podiatry companies. We specialise in the treatment of all manner of foot & leg pain, soft tissue injury, musculoskeletal issues, plantar fasciitis, bunions, adolescent growing pains, work, sports and recreational related injuries and concerns. We undertake minor surgery, specialise in prescription orthotic therapy, nutrition therapy, prolotherapy (regenerative injection therapy) and can advise on proper footwear selection.

We look past the surface symptoms to find the cause of your foot and leg problems and always take a personal interest in ensuring all our patients' achieve successful outcomes.

We have 16 locations across Melbourne - Armadale, Berwick, Brighton, Clayton, Coburg, Doncaster East, Fitzroy North, Hampton, Hawthorn, Ivanhoe, Moonee Ponds, Mt Eliza, Port Melbourne, Wantirna South, Werribee, Williamstown

values: Foot, ankle, leg, knee, hip pain

values.name: Foot + Leg Pain Clinics

values.description:
Specialist front-end web development studio based in Brighton on the South coast.  Produces highly creative and responsive digital development, operating at the forefront of emerging interactive technologies.

Works alongside many big-names (agencies and household names) and have established a strong reputation based on the very high quality of work produced.

We provide professional, original, creative and artistic audio solutions for media.  Be it Film, Television, Radio, Web, Videogames or any other purpose.  With studios in the UK media hub of Brighton, we have access to a host of talented composers and musicians who’s talents are only matched by their passion for music.

values.description:
Chrome Group are an Audio Visual Supply & Event Management company based in Brighton headed by Chris Gray, an audio visual technician and promotions specialist. 

Our wide-ranging team are enthusiastic, creative and all strive for complete customer satisfaction.

 

    
We supply, hire and install audio visual equipment - anything from data projectors to PA systems and stage lighting.

We create and manage events designed solely to help our clients engage and inspire their target audience.
    
We deliver meeting and conference peripherals at a moments notice - anything from whiteboards to conference phones and branded stationary.
    
We can help in any other way that transforms your event from the ordinary to the extraordinary!
values.name: Chrome Group UK

values.description:

CommonUncommon Ltd: Web Design, Front-End Development, iPhone Applications, iPad Applications, Creative Direction, Art Direction, Advertising, Branding, E-Commerce, Social Media
